评论详情: One of my favorite summer outfits I wore so much last summer fits perfectly. I’m 51 about 125 pounds and I ordered an extra small.

Unfortunately, this item wasn’t the right fit for me. I ordered a size medium, but it was too large and unflattering for my body type, making me look about 35 lbs heavier. While the overall style was cute, the fabric felt too light and was prone to wrinkling. Sadly, I had to return it.

I wanted to like these but I have a long torso and legs. It's super cute but I tried adjusting the straps to fit more comfortably but it didn't give a lot. Super sad but the fabric is thick and super cute

Sizing was spot on, usual size but slightly oversized but not frumpy. I'm 5'10, 170lbs and large is perfect. Even long enough for my long legs to me modest! If it washes well I'll definitely get more for the summer. Got this for a Christmas trip to Florida.
I love this color. Received several compliments when worn to the farmer’s market.

评论概述: Comfortable and fits right! Even for a 69 year old!!

Great for beach coverup

Great relaxed, casual romper for summer! Ordered a second one in a different color. Lightweight fabric and relaxed fit were perfect for high temps and humidity (southeastern PA summer).  Color true to photo, washable, would recommend air drying to avoid possible light shrinkage.  Very comfortable and looked cute.  Wore with tank tops or fitted t-shirt. Great at the beach also!
Idk why, maybe I just felt too fat
Surprisingly well made, good quality cotton linen and not a gauze fabric.
The button fell off after only wearing it a couple of times.

评论详情: These shorts come in several attractive colors, and are very cute and trendy.  They are super comfortable in very hot weather because your waist does not sweat as much as it does in conventional shorts.  The fabric is very thin but not see-through.  The buttons are real and adjustable.
So comfy, lightweight, and cute! I’ve gotten lots of compliments every time I wear it

I usually wear a small, but I went with a medium just to be safe. It ended up being a bit big, so I could’ve stuck with my usual size. The quality is great, though, and it worked perfectly as a last-minute game day outfit!
Love this so much! I’ll be buying more colors! It’s very comfortable, looks nice and is good quality. Made me feel good postpartum and easy to nurse in.
My new favorite weekend outfit! Perfect with a tee or a tank. Colors were true to the pictures.

Love this romper and the color. Perfect for my post-partum body that is still not back in shape!

It fit great at first until I accidentally shrunk it 😅 I had it on tumble dry low and it shrunk majorly! That’s the only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars total. Fabric is nice for hotter climates. Wrinkles, but not excessively.

i don’t know about those other reviews - unless the company has inaccurate cutting (which i don’t think they do), these runs exactly to size as is described. i ordered a size up per the reviews and that was a big mistake! i’m hoping it will shrink in the wash. i bought this for a halloween costume, so i dont have much else to say about daily wear etc. it seems perfectly suitable for my desired outcome.

Super cute.  I love it, but even with washing in cold water and air drying - it shrunk significantly and I have to order another in a larger size. Amazon suggested a size XL - second order is going to be a XXL.
Love this. I bought 2. Wish they came in more colors of my liking.
Been wearing this since I’m my first trimester and still wearing them at 8 months pregnant! I love the adjustable straps.
The seam started ripping after 1 wear. Really disappointed in the quality

The color and fit are perfect! Decent quality, although I'm a little worried the buttons won't last. Love the details like the pleats at the front pocket. Super comfy and breathable. Perfect for summer!
I love how these fit and the fabric is so comfortable.  I got so many compliments.

Great summer and fall piece! Ordered XL 5'6" 200#

I am 5'6" and 155. I bought a large based on reviews and it fits perfectly. Roomy, but doesn't look oversized. Lightweight material. I washed it and it did shrink a bit so best to let it air dry unless you are looking for it to fit a bit better.

ordered to wear as my pregnant belly grew during the summer and it was super cute and comfy
I’m 5’10” and this fit great!
Cuter than expected.  Fit great.  A bit short or pulls a bit if you are tall, however (I'm 5'9 with an average size torso).

This is so cute while still being very comfortable. I ordered in another color. It’s great.

Super comfy. Perfect fit even if you have a longer torso. Not too short, perfect length. Came back and ordered another one.

评论概述: Do not wash, super cute outfit otherwise
评论详情: Purchased for summer and love this jumper! Fabric is thick, feels good, is not elastic at all. Easy to change in and out of, buttons feel secure and not cheap. Pockets are not super deep but can fit small items. Used the top pocket for my small card holder and it fit perfect. Would definitely buy this in other colors. Buyer beware as this item is “dry chean only” per the tag, I messed up and did not read the tag, washed/dried the outfit and it shrunk a lot!!! My daughter thinks it fits better now than before I washed it. Not able to return it so I’ll wear it here and there since it looks super small on me, I can only use the first bottom as the second and third button are way to tight now.
Super comfortable lightweight I had to buy another one in a different color
I love these jumpers.  Excellent quality and great colors…so far I have purchased the green, black and grey.  Perfect for the Florida heat.  I’m 5’2 152lbs and the medium fit perfectly.
I love this romper! It has 3 buttons so I can buy my size but still make it long enough! I own 3!

this was my second purchase of this romper. My first one fit great has not shrunk when washed. This romper, however, fit great when I got it but has shrunk significantly. They’re washed the same load together so I don't know why one shrink and the other didn't. otherwise, they fit good and are very comfortable.
This was the cutest romper and I wore it once. It fit perfectly. When I washed it it shrunk significantly- over a size smaller. Unfortunately I missed the return window. :(
Didn’t like
I love this Romper outfit. It's so comfy and soft and loose.  I can wear it every day! I bought three different colors. I know I will wear this out. I recommend.
Love the jumper but only wore it once and after washing it I can no longer wear it because it shrunk so much.

I didn’t even dry it and it shrunk to where I couldn’t wear it.

Love this! Ordered small and fits perfect.
These are super comfortable and fit as expected. They are adjustable which is nice for maternity for my growing belly. They are easy to wrinkle.
This is a great outfit for the price! So cute and comfortable

Great romper!
These fit great, just a tad scratchy. Went to wash them and they're dry clean only. I'd return them if I could.

I have a short, hourglass figure and normally rompers like this can be boxy and unflattering, but the pleats are in just the right places and the adjustable straps shorten it to work with my height. Only downside is that the material is a little cheap.
Nothing I didn’t like with this. It also washed up really nicely. I did not dry it though, hung to dry and then softened it up in the dryer once it was dry.

评论概述: So cute but ripped after the first wear

评论概述: DO NOT WASH! Dry Clean ONLY!
评论详情: I read the reviews before purchasing this item and saw that it might shrink, so I ordered a size up and, because it was very wrinkled and smelled funny upon arrival, put it to wash on delicate/cold water. Bad decision!! It is now too small for my size-small daughter!! When I checked the tag it says dry clean only!! Which not a single review mentioned. I am returning (if they'll let me) and repurchasing this item, because I did love it when I tried it on. But I have no idea where the nearest dry cleaner is so I may have just spent $20 bucks on a "once and done" outfit. *whomp whomp*

I love this overall jumper. It is super comfortable, hangs without catching or bunching or sagging at all. I love the pockets & they are comfortably placed. I wear a small to medium, but purchased an XL per the reviews. Yes, it runs small. The XL fits well. I might have been able to wear a L, but I'm not sure how it will wash. I typically hang my better clothing, so if you're a 'dryer always' person, I'm not sure how it will wear.
